message: As I stand there holding the USB stick, Mink gets up and walks toward me.
By the time I realize he's there, it's already too late.

name: ミンク
message: "I'm not gonna put up with your bullshit forever."
I stumble back, mouth tasting of blood. His punch must have reopened the cuts from last night.
I wipe my mouth and shoot Mink a glare.
It's one thing if he fucks with me, but there's no way I'm letting him use Ren.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah? Well, what about you?! If you want my help, try talking for a change!"
Driven by anger, I throw a punch at Mink.
I'm not even surprised when my punch doesn't land. I'm still weak from last night's assault. His answering punch knocks me to the floor.

name: ミンク
message: "If you want me to stop, do what I say."
Mink sits back down on the couch, picking his pipe up off the table in the process.
As angry as I am, I still have questions.
He told me himself that the plan is all he cares about. My feelings don't matter in the slightest.
But what the fuck is he so hell-bent on accomplishing, exactly?
I know he's after Toue, but he never told me why. There has to be a reason, something driving him to trample everything in his path.
His will is just... so strong.
...But this issue is something else entirely. I refuse to let him lay a finger on Ren.
Just then, Ren nudges my leg.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren!"
Ren has the USB stick in his mouth. I must've dropped it at some point.

name: 蓮
message: "Use it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But if I do that, you might―"

name: 蓮
message: "Don't worry. I know you're concerned, but..."

name: 蓮
message: "Mink will not hesitate to take any action that might further his cause. Consequently, he has a very high probability of success."

name: 蓮
message: "And if his objective is the same as yours, then I have no objection to being used for that purpose. I'm sure you can understand that too."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...But it might hurt you. I don't want that."

name: 蓮
message: "If I break, you'll fix me. Won't you?"

name: 蓮
message: "Am I wrong?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...But what if it's something I can't fix?"

name: 蓮
message: "I cannot deny the possibility, but the probability that you will be able to repair me is also non-zero."
Ren trusts me completely.
...I'll just have to prove worthy of his trust.
I stroke Ren's back with my whole hand and take the USB stick from his mouth.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Alright. I'm gonna install it."

name: 蓮
message: "Understood."
Ren rolls over on the floor, exposing his belly to me.
I part Ren's fluffy fur to find the USB port. After a moment's hesitation, I plug in the stick.

name: 蓮
message: "...Transfer complete."
After making that announcement, Ren gets up and shakes his body.
I look him over carefully to make sure nothing's wrong.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you alright?"

name: 蓮
message: "Yes, quite alright."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good..."
I breathe a long sigh of relief.
But the real trial is yet to come. I can't lower my guard yet.
